author: Myah Ward
title: Brooke Baldwin is second CNN anchor to contract coronavirus this week
description: Baldwin said she looks forward to being back on television “real soon.”
content:
Brooke Baldwin. | Evan Agostini/Invision/AP Photo
CNN anchor Brooke Baldwin announced Friday she has tested positive for coronavirus after being hit with a sudden onset of symptoms Thursday afternoon. 
I am OKAY. It came on suddenly yesterday afternoon. Chi… [+388 chars]
